summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5723 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 6, University Scenic Addition, being the alley between East 62nd Street and East 63rd Street, from 15th Avenue Northeast to 17th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75563, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
